Butterfly Shards

Have you ever been alone with your future staring back at you? When you look into a mirror what do you see? We have a choice everyday to decide who we are going to be. Sometimes sacrifices have to be made for the people we care about most. Eight young people form a good friendship through a mysterious house to shelter from the storm. Will they get out?
